paragraphs.body: A promotional poster for Love amongst the Dragons depicts two ${link_0} embracing to form the image of a heart.
paragraphs.text: A promotional poster for Love amongst the Dragons depicts two dragons embracing to form the image of a heart.

paragraphs.body: Love amongst the Dragons is a popular ${link_0} play about the Dragon Emperor who is cursed by the Dark Water Spirit to live in mortal human form.
paragraphs.text: Love amongst the Dragons is a popular Fire Nation play about the Dragon Emperor who is cursed by the Dark Water Spirit to live in mortal human form.

paragraphs.body: The final scene of Love amongst the Dragons: after defeating the Dark Water Spirit, the Dragon Emperor and Empress are reunited.
paragraphs.text: The final scene of Love amongst the Dragons: after defeating the Dark Water Spirit, the Dragon Emperor and Empress are reunited.

paragraphs.body: The play features the Dragon Emperor, bound to mortal form by the Dark Water Spirit, and forced to adopt the alias of Noren. The humble experience results in Noren falling in love with a mortal, and through this love he is able to break free of his curse. The play concludes with Noren defeating the Dark Water Spirit and embracing his mortal girlfriend, revealed to be the Dragon Empress.
paragraphs.text: The play features the Dragon Emperor, bound to mortal form by the Dark Water Spirit, and forced to adopt the alias of Noren. The humble experience results in Noren falling in love with a mortal, and through this love he is able to break free of his curse. The play concludes with Noren defeating the Dark Water Spirit and embracing his mortal girlfriend, revealed to be the Dragon Empress.
